Author: Throwaway17898753
Text: Bodies are weird. I hate it. I hydrate to the tune of 6 monsters, a ton of black coffee and tons of water a day

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: The main short-term gain I’ve heard of with exercise is muscle tissue retaining some additional water as the fibers work to repair themselves. But it sounds like you’re experiencing a more system-wide bloat? I’m not much help there sadly. I do usually try to take a look at my hydration/electrolytes just in case that could be a culprit. It can be such a frustrating and confusing experience - I hope it resolves soon!
